name: Steering Behavior
description:
Steering Behavior

Steering behaviors are an amalgam of different behaviors that are used to organically manage the movement of an AI agent. Steering behaviors are used to maneuver IA agents in a 2D or 3D environment. With these behaviors, agents are able to better react to changes in their environment. For example, behaviors such as obstacle avoidance, pursuit and group cohesion are all steering behaviors. 

Role : AI Programmer
Engine : Unity
Module : AI For Games
Duration : 6 Weeks (Jul 2018 - Aug 2018)
